plot: Poli is deaf and he needs to know what happened in the Spanish Civil War. His Grandfather could help him but he is in the hospital and he just can move an arm. A chess set will be the only way to show Poli the true of that war.
title: Una historia sin palabras
plot_es: Poli is deaf and he needs to know what happened in the Spanish Civil War. His Grandfather could help him but he is in the hospital and he just can move an arm. A chess set will be the only way to show Poli the true of that war.
plot_en: Poli is deaf and he needs to know what happened in the Spanish Civil War. His Grandfather could help him but he is in the hospital and he just can move an arm. A chess set will be the only way to show Poli the true of that war.
